title: If I taught someone something wrong, must I rectify and correct it? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: he says that if i taught someone something wrong must i rectify it and correct it to him the answer is yes if i taught my brother that eating with the left hand is permissible and i discovered later on that this is wrong it's haram to eat with your left hand and i see him eat or i know that he took this information and adopted it and is embracing it and i still don't correct him i am sinful and my sin would continue throughout
